LanguageData.Bullet_RSBattleRifle.label: battle rifle bullet
LanguageData.Gun_RSBattleRifle.label: battle rifle
LanguageData.Gun_RSBattleRifle.description: Big cousin of assault rifles, the battle rifles higher-caliber rounds provide greater power and range, though they have have greater weight and produce stronger recoil, making them less than ideal for fully automatic fire.
LanguageData.Gun_RSBattleRifle.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_RSBattleRifle.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_RSCarbine.label: carbine bullet
LanguageData.Gun_RSCarbine.label: carbine
LanguageData.Gun_RSCarbine.description: Shortened versions of conventional assault rifles. The smaller size and lighter weight of carbines make them easier to handle, ideal for close quarter combat.
LanguageData.Gun_RSCarbine.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_RSCarbine.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_PistolHeavyRevolver.label: revolver bullet
LanguageData.Gun_PistolHeavyRevolver.label: heavy revolver
LanguageData.Gun_PistolHeavyRevolver.description: Ancient pattern repeating handgun. It's large caliber ammunition guarantees a great deal of stopping power.
LanguageData.Gun_PistolHeavyRevolver.tools.0.label: grip
LanguageData.Gun_PistolHeavyRevolver.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_RSAMRifle.label: anti material rifle bullet
LanguageData.Gun_RSAMRifle.label: anti-material rifle
LanguageData.Gun_RSAMRifle.description: Usually referred to as a "can opener" in the rimworlds, the anti-material rifle is a large-caliber, heavy sniper rifle designed for use against heavily armored target.
LanguageData.Gun_RSAMRifle.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_RSAMRifle.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_Repeater.label: repeater bullet
LanguageData.Gun_Repeater.label: repeating rifle
LanguageData.Gun_Repeater.description: Archaic design even in the rimworld standard, the repeating rifle is popular among muffalo herders. Medium range, quick firing weapon.
LanguageData.Gun_Repeater.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_Repeater.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_AutomaticRifle.label: automatic rifle bullet
LanguageData.Gun_AutomaticRifle.label: automatic rifle
LanguageData.Gun_AutomaticRifle.description: Heavy, automatic support weapon. While it has a slower fire rate than LMG, its large calibre bullet guarantees impressive firepower.
LanguageData.Gun_AutomaticRifle.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_AutomaticRifle.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_MilitiaRifle.label: rifle bullet
LanguageData.Gun_MilitiaRifle.label: militia rifle
LanguageData.Gun_MilitiaRifle.description: This, has spilled someone's blood over 3000 years, is a real weapon of mass destruction. Rugged, easy to use and cheap, it is an every militia's favorite weapon. It has a slightly better firepower than the assault rifle, while inferior everything else.
LanguageData.Gun_MilitiaRifle.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_MilitiaRifle.tools.1.label: barrel
